WelcomePage.title: soulmate fast & easily
WelcomePage.catchphrase: Cross ways and explore the world together
WelcomePage.about: CrossWays is an international platform created to help people struggling with finding company for their trips or feeling desire to improve its planning. Developed by the group of particulary stubborn students, CrossWays has to offer you a lot of useful tools for satisfying work and travel planning. Keep reading to know more.

SeparatorContent.title: Top opportunities for you
SeparatorContent.tripParagraph: We will help you with the "boring" stuff!
SeparatorContent.matchingParagraph: Filter travels and people by our special tool!
SeparatorContent.adviceParagraph: We will always help you out!
